19.verse: atattira balangira ku liiso era nga tafa ku bagagga kusinga bw’afa ku baavu, kubanga egyo gye mirimu gy’emikono gye?

20.verse: Mu kaseera buseera baba bafiiridde wakati mu ttumbi. Abantu banyeenyezebwa ne baggyibwawo. Abo ab’amaanyi batwalibwa n’omukono ogutali gw’abantu.

21.verse: “Amaaso ge gatunuulira amakubo g’abantu; atunuulira buli kigere kye batambula.

22.verse: Teri kifo kikwafu wadde ekisiikirize eky’amaanyi, ababi gye bayinza okwekweka.

23.verse: Katonda teyeetaaga kwongera kwekebejja bantu okulabika mu maaso ge okusalirwa omusango.

24.verse: Awatali kwebuuza ku muntu yenna, amenyaamenya ab’amaanyi n’ateekawo abalala mu kifo kyabwe.

25.verse: Olw’okubanga amanyi ebikolwa byabwe, abamalamu amaanyi ekiro ne babetentebwa.

26.verse: Ababonereza olw’ebikolwa byabwe ebibi abantu bonna nga balaba,

27.verse: kubanga baamuvaako ne balekeraawo okumugoberera ne bataddayo kufaayo n’akatono ku makubo ge gonna.

28.verse: Baleetera abaavu okukaaba, ne kumutuukako era n’awulira okukaaba kw’abanyigirizibwa.

29.verse: Naye bw’asalawo obutabaako ky’ayogera, ani ayinza okumunenya? Bwakweka amaaso ge ani ayinza okumulaba? Eggwanga n’omuntu abalinako obuyinza bwe bumu;

30.verse: aziyiza omuntu atatya Katonda okufuga, aleme okutega abantu emitego.

31.verse: “Singa omuntu agamba Katonda nti, gunsinze, sikyaddayo kwonoona,

32.verse: kye sitegeera kinjigirize, bwe mba nga nsobezza sikyaddayo kukikola,

33.verse: olwo Katonda akuddemu nga bw’oyagala, akuleke ng’ogaanye okwenenya? Kaakano ggwe olina okusalawo, so sinze; noolwekyo mbuulira ggwe ky’omanyi.

34.verse: “Abantu abalina okutegeera mumbuulire, abasajja abagezi abawulira muntegeeze,

35.verse: ‘Yobu ayogeza butamanya ebigambo bye tebiriimu kwolesebwa.’

36.verse: Singa Yobu agezesebbwa okutuusa ku nkomerero, olw’okwogera ng’abasajja abakozi b’ebibi!

37.verse: Kubanga ku kibi kye ayongeddeko obujeemu, n’akuba mu ngalo wakati mu ffe, n’ayongera okwogera ng’awakanya Katonda.”

1.verse: Eriku n’ayongera okwogera nti,

2.verse: “Olowooza kiba kituufu ggwe okugamba nti, Katonda ananziggyako omusango. Oyogera nti, obutuukirivu bwange businga obwa Katonda.

3.verse: Ate obuuza nti, ‘Nganyulwa ntya?’ Kirungi ki kye nfuna mu kwonoona kwange?

4.verse: “Nandyagadde okukuddamu ne mikwano gyo egyo gy’oli nagyo.

5.verse: Tunula eri eggulu olabe; tunuulira ebire, ebiri waggulu ennyo okukusinga.

6.verse: Singa oyonoona ekyo kimukwatako kitya? Ebyonoono byo bwe byeyongera, ekyo kimukolako ki?

7.verse: Bw’oba omutuukirivu, kiki ky’oba omuwadde, oba kiki ky’aba afunye okuva mu ngalo zo?

8.verse: Okwonoona kwo kukosa muntu nga ggwe, era n’obutuukirivu bwo bukwata ku baana b’abantu.

9.verse: Abantu bakaaba olw’okunyigirizibwa okw’amaanyi, balaajaanira ab’omukono ogw’amaanyi.

10.verse: Naye tewali n’omu agamba nti, Aluwa MUKAMA Omutonzi wange atuwa ennyimba ekiro,

11.verse: atuyigiriza ebingi okusinga ensolo ez’omu nsiko, era n’atufuula bagezi okusinga ebinyonyi eby’omu nsiko?

12.verse: Newaakubadde nga bakaaba, tayinza kuwulira n’addamu kukaaba kw’abasajja ab’amalala abakozi b’ebibi.

13.verse: Ddala ddala Katonda tawuliriza kukoowoola kwabwe okwo okutaliimu; Ayinzabyonna takufaako.

14.verse: Kale kiba kitya bw’ogamba nti tomulaba, era nti, Omusango gwo guli mu maaso ge era oteekwa okumulindirira;

15.verse: oba nti, ne bw’asunguwala tabonereza era tafaayo nnyo ku butali butuukirivu.

16.verse: Kale nno Yobu ayasamya akamwa ke okwogera ebitaliimu; obutamanya bumwogeza ebigambo olukunkumuli.”

1.verse: Eriku ne yeeyongera okwogera nti,

2.verse: “Yongera okuŋŋumiikirizaako katono nkulage, nkyalina bye nnina okwogera ebifa ku Katonda.

3.verse: Amagezi ge nnina gava wala, era mmanyi nga Omutonzi wange alamula mu bwenkanya.

4.verse: Eky’amazima ebigambo byange si bikyamu, oyo akakasa by’amanyi y’ayogera naawe.

5.verse: “Laba, Katonda wa buyinza, tanyooma bantu; w’amaanyi, anywerera ku bigendererwa bye.

6.verse: Talamya bakozi ba bibi, era awa ababonyaabonyezebwa ebibasaanira.

7.verse: Taggya maaso ge ku batuukirivu, abatuuza ku ntebe ey’obwakabaka n’abagulumiza emirembe n’emirembe.

8.verse: Naye abantu bwe baba basibiddwa enjegere nga banywezeddwa n’emiguwa egy’okulumwa

9.verse: n’abategeeza ensobi zaabwe, n’okwonoona kwabwe, nti, beewaggudde,

10.verse: aggula amatu gaabwe bawulirize okunenyezebwa n’abalagira beenenye ekibi kyabwe.

11.verse: Bwe bamugondera ne bamuweereza, ennaku zaabwe zonna balizimala mu kwesiima, era n’emyaka gyabwe mu kusanyuka.

12.verse: Naye bwe batamugondera, baalizikirizibwa n’ekitala, bafe nga tebalina magezi.

13.verse: “Ab’emitima egitatya Katonda baba n’obukyayi. Ne bw’abasiba, tebamukaabirira abasumulule.

14.verse: Bafiira mu buvubuka bwabwe era obulamu bwabwe buzikiririra mu basajja abenzi.

15.verse: Anunula anyigirizibwa mu kubonaabona kwe, n’aggula okutu kwe mu kujoogebwa kwe.

16.verse: “Akusendasenda okukuggya mu kamwa k’okubonaabona, akuteeke mu kifo ekigazi ekitaliimu kuziyizibwa, omanye emirembe gy’emeeza yo ejjudde emmere ennungi.

17.verse: Naye kaakano weetisse omugugu ogw’okusalirwa omusango abakozi b’ebibi gwe basaanira; okusalirwa omusango n’obwenkanya byakunyweza.

18.verse: Weegendereze oleme kukkiriza kusendebwasendebwa; obunene bw’enguzi buleme okukukyamya.

19.verse: Obugagga bwo oba okufuba kwo kwonna binaakuyamba okukuggya mu buyinike?

20.verse: Teweegomba budde bwa kiro olyoke owalule abantu okuva mu bifo byabwe.

21.verse: Weegendereze oleme kukola bitali bya butuukirivu, by’osinga okwagala okukira okubonyaabonyezebwa.

22.verse: “Laba Katonda yagulumira mu maanyi ge; ani ayigiriza nga ye?

23.verse: Ani eyali amukubidde amakubo, oba okumugamba nti, ‘Ky’okoze si kituufu?’

24.verse: Jjukira ng’oteekwa okugulumizanga emirimu gye, abantu gye bayimba mu nnyimba.

25.verse: Abantu bonna baagiraba, omuntu agirengerera wala.

26.verse: Laba, Katonda agulumizibwe! Assukiridde okutegeera kwaffe; obungi bw’emyaka gye tebunoonyezeka.

27.verse: “Kubanga akuŋŋaanya amatondo g’amazzi, agafuuka enkuba etonnya mu bugga;

28.verse: ebire bivaamu amazzi gaabyo, enkuba n’ekuba abantu.

29.verse: Ani ayinza okutegeera engeri gy’asaasaanyamu ebire, okubwatuka okuva ku kituuti kye?

30.verse: Laba, asaasaanya okumyansa kw’eggulu, era n’abikka obuziba bw’ennyanja.

31.verse: Eyo y’engeri gy’afugamu amawanga, n’agawa emmere mu bungi.

32.verse: Emikono gye agijjuza eraddu, n’agiragira ekube ebifo bye yeerondeddemu.

33.verse: Okubwatuka kwayo kulangirira kibuyaga ajja, n’ente ne zirangirira okujja kwayo.”

1.verse: “Kino kikankanya omutima gwange, ne gubuuka okuva mu kifo kyagwo.

2.verse: Wuliriza okubwatuka kw’eddoboozi lye, n’okuwuluguma okuva mu kamwa ke.

3.verse: Asumulula eggulu ne limyansa wansi w’eggulu wonna, n’aliragira ligende ku nkomerero y’ensi.

4.verse: Kino oluggwa, okuwuluguma kw’eddoboozi lye kwe kuddako, abwatuka n’eddoboozi lye ery’omwanguka, era eddoboozi lye bwe liwulirwa, tewabaawo kisigala nga bwe kibadde.

5.verse: Eddoboozi lya Katonda libwatuka mu ngeri ey’ekitalo; akola ebintu ebikulu ebisukka okutegeera kwaffe.

6.verse: Agamba omuzira nti, ‘Ggwa ku nsi,’ ate eri enkuba etonnya nti, ‘Ttonnya nnyo.’

7.verse: Emirimu gya buli muntu giyimirira, buli omu n’alyoka amanya amaanyi ga Katonda.

8.verse: Ensolo ne ziryoka zessogga empuku zaazo, ne zigenda zeekukuma.

9.verse: Omuyaga ne gulyoka guva mu nnyumba yaagwo, n’obunnyogovu ne buva mu mpewo ekuŋŋunta.

10.verse: Omuzira ne guva mu mukka gwa Katonda n’amazzi amangi ne gekwata kitole.

11.verse: Ebire abijjuza amatondo g’amazzi, n’asaasaanya okumyansa kw’eggulu.

12.verse: Byetooloolatooloola nga y’abiragira, ne bituukiriza byonna by’abiragira, ku nsi yonna okubeera abantu.

13.verse: Bwe kuba kubonereza, oba okufukirira ensi oba okulaga okwagala kwe, atonnyesa enkuba.

14.verse: “Wuliriza kino Yobu; sooka oyimirire olowooze ku bikolwa bya Katonda eby’ettendo.

15.verse: Omanyi Katonda engeri gy’alagiramu ebire, n’aleetera eggulu okumyansa?

16.verse: Omanyi engeri ebire gye bituulamu mu bbanga, amakula g’emirimu gy’oyo eyatuukirira mu kumanya?

17.verse: Ggwe alina ebyambalo ebibuguma, ensi bw’eba ng’ekkakkanyizibbwa embuyaga ez’obukiikaddyo,

18.verse: oyinza okumwegattako ne mubamba eggulu, eryaguma ne libeera ng’endabirwamu ensanuuse?

19.verse: “Tubuulire kye tunaamugamba; tetusobola kuwoza nsonga zaffe gy’ali olw’ekizikiza kye tulimu.

20.verse: Asaanidde okubuulirwa kye njagala okwogera? Eriyo omuntu yenna ayinza okusaba okumalibwawo?

21.verse: Kaakano tewali n’omu ayinza kutunula mu njuba, olw’engeri gy’eyakamu ku ggulu, ng’empewo emaze okuyita, n’eyelula ebire.

22.verse: Mu bukiikakkono evaayo zaabu; Katonda ajja mu kitiibwa eky’amaanyi.

23.verse: Ayinzabyonna tatuukikako era agulumidde mu maanyi, mu bwenkanya bwe era ne butuukirivu bwe, tawaliriza muntu yenna.

24.verse: Noolwekyo abantu bamutya, takitwala ng’ekikulu olw’abo abeerowooza okuba abagezi mu mitima gyabwe.”

1.verse: MUKAMA Ayogera - MUKAMA n’addamu Yobu ng’ayita mu muyaga, n’ayogera nti,

2.verse: “Ani ono aleeta ekizikiza ku kuteesa kwange, n’ebigambo ebitaliimu magezi?

3.verse: Yambala ebyambalo byo ng’omusajja, mbeeko bye nkubuuza naawe onziremu.

4.verse: “Wali ludda wa nga nteekawo emisingi gy’ensi? Mbuulira bw’oba otegeera.

5.verse: Ani eyasalawo ebipimo byayo? Ddala oteekwa okuba ng’omanyi! Oba ani eyagipima n’olukoba?

6.verse: Entobo zaayo zaateekebwa ku ki?

7.verse: Emunyeenye ez’oku makya bwe zaali ziyimba, era n’abaana ba Katonda bonna nga baleekaana olw’essanyu,

8.verse: ani eyasiba enzigi n’aggalira ennyanja, bwe yava mu lubuto lwayo?

9.verse: “Bwe nakolera ebire ekyambalo kyabyo, ne mbisibira mu kizikiza ekikwafu,

10.verse: bwe n’abiteekerawo we bikoma ne mbiteerako emitayimbwa n’enzigi,

11.verse: bwe nagamba nti, Wano we mutuuse we munaakoma temujja kweyongerayo, era wano amayengo gammwe ag’amalala we ganaakoma?

12.verse: “Oba wali olagidde ku budde okukya kasookedde obaawo ku nsi, oba emmambya okugiraga ekifo kyayo,

13.verse: eryoke ekwate ensi w’ekoma eginyeenye esuule eri ababi bagiveeko bagwe eri?

14.verse: Ensi eggyayo ebyafaayo byayo n’eba ng’ebbumba wansi w’akabonero, ebyafaayo ebyo ne byefaananyiriza olugoye.

15.verse: Abakozi b’ebibi bammibwa ekitangaala kyabwe, n’omukono gwabwe gwe bayimusa gumenyebwa.

16.verse: “Wali otuuseeko ku nsulo ennyanja w’esibuka, oba n’olaga mu buziba bw’ennyanja?

17.verse: Wali obikuliddwa enzigi z’emagombe? Oba wali olabye enzigi z’ekisiikirize ky’okufa?

18.verse: Wali otegedde obugazi bw’ensi? Byogere, oba bino byonna obimanyi.

19.verse: “Ekkubo eridda mu nnyumba omusana gye gusula liri ludda wa? N’ekifo ekizikiza gye kisula kye kiruwa?

20.verse: Ddala, osobola okubitwala gye bibeera? Omanyi ekkubo erigenda gye bisula?

21.verse: Ddala oteekwa okuba ng’obimanyi, kubanga wali wazaalibwa dda!

22.verse: “Wali oyingidde amazzi agakwata mu butiti, gye gaterekebwa, oba wali olabye omuzira gye guterekebwa?

23.verse: Bye nterekera ebiseera eby’emitawaana, bikozesebwe mu nnaku ez’entalo n’okulwana?

24.verse: Kkubo ki erituusa ekitangaala ky’omusana gye kisaasaanira, oba empewo ey’ebuvanjuba gy’esaasaanira ku nsi?

25.verse: Ani akubira amataba emikutu mwe ganaayita, oba ekkubo eggulu eribwatuka mwe liyita?

26.verse: Ani atonnyesa enkuba mu nsi abantu mwe batabeera, eddungu omutali muntu yenna,

27.verse: n’okufukirira ettaka eryalekebwa awo, eryazika, n’okulimezaako omuddo?

28.verse: Enkuba erina kitaawe waayo? Ani azaala amatondo ag’omusulo?

29.verse: Omuzira guva mu lubuto lw’ani? Ani azaala obutiti obukwafu obw’omu ggulu,

30.verse: amazzi mwe gakwatira ne gakaluba ng’amayinja, ne kungulu kw’obuziba ne kukwata?

31.verse: “Oyinza okuziyiza okwakaayakana kwa Kakaaga, oba okutaggulula enkoba za Ntungalugoye?

32.verse: Oyinza okufulumya emunyeenye ziveeyo zaake ng’ekiseera kyazo kituuse, oba okuluŋŋamya eddubu n’abaana balyo?

33.verse: Omanyi amateeka n’obufuzi bw’eggulu? Oyinza okuteekawo obufuzi bw’alyo oba obwa Katonda ku nsi?

34.verse: “Oyinza okuyimusa eddoboozi lyo oleekaanire ebire, olyoke obiggyemu amataba gakubikke?

35.verse: Ggwe otuma eggulu limyanse era libwatuke? Lisobola okukweyanjulira nti, ‘Tuutuno tuli wano’?

36.verse: Ani eyateeka amagezi mu mutima gw’omuntu, oba eyateeka okutegeera mu mmeeme?

37.verse: Ani alina amagezi agabala ebire? Ani ayinza okuwunzika ebibya by’amazzi eby’omu ggulu,

38.verse: enfuufu ng’efuuse ettaka ekkalu, era amafunfugu ne geegattira ddala?

39.verse: “Empologoma enkazi, oyinza okugiyiggira ky’eneerya, oba okuliisa empologoma n’ozimalako enjala,

40.verse: bwe zeezinga mu mpuku zaazo, oba bwe zigalamira nga ziteeze mu bisaka?

41.verse: Ani awa namuŋŋoona emmere, abaana baayo bwe bakaabirira Katonda, nga batambulatambula nga babuliddwa emmere?”

1.verse: “Omanyi ebiro embuzi z’oku nsozi mwe zizaalira? Oba oyinza okumanya empeewo we ziwakira?

2.verse: Oyinza okubala emyezi gye zimala zizaale? Omanyi obudde mwe zizaalira?

3.verse: Zikutama ne zizaala abaana baazo, ne ziwona obulumi bw’okuzaala.

4.verse: Abaana baazo bakula ne bagejjera ku ttale, batambula ne bagenda obutadda.

5.verse: “Ani eyaleka entulege okwetambulira mu ddembe lyayo? Ani eyasumulula emiguwa gyayo,

6.verse: gye nawa ensi ey’omuddo okuba amaka gaayo, n’ensi ey’omunnyo okubeerangamu?

7.verse: Esekerera oluyoogaano lw’ekibuga, tewuliriza kulekaana kw’abavuzi ba bidduka.

8.verse: Ebuna ensozi, ly’eddundiro lyayo, ng’enoonya ekintu kyonna ekibisi.

9.verse: “Embogo eyinza okukkiriza okuba omuweereza wo, n’esula ekiro mu kisibo kyo?

10.verse: Oyinza okugisiba ku muguwa n’ogirimisa olubimbi? Eyinza okukuvaako emabega ng’erima mu kiwonvu.

11.verse: Oyinza okugyesiga olw’amaanyi gaayo amangi? Oyinza okugirekera emirimu gyo egy’amaanyi?

12.verse: Oyinza okugyesiga okukuleetera emmere yo ey’empeke, oba okukuleetera eŋŋaano mu gguuliro lyo?

13.verse: “Ebiwaawaatiro bya maaya bisanyusa nga byewujja, naye ebiwaawaatiro n’ebyoya bya kalooli tebiraga kisa.

14.verse: Kubanga emaaya ebiika amagi gaayo ku ttaka, n’egaleka ne gabugumira mu musenyu,

15.verse: ne yeerabira nti, ekigere kisobola okugaasa, era nga ensolo ey’omu nsiko eyinza okugalinnya.

16.verse: Obwana bwayo ebuyisa bubi ng’obutali bwayo gy’obeera nti, yazaalira bwereere.

17.verse: Kubanga Katonda teyagiwa magezi wadde okutegeera.

18.verse: Ate bw’eyanjuluza ebiwaawaatiro byayo edduke esoomooza embalaasi n’omugoba waayo.

19.verse: “Embalaasi ggwe ogiwa amaanyi, oba ggwe oyambaza ensingo yaayo obwoya obwewumba?

20.verse: Ggwe ogisobozesa okubuuka ng’enzige n’ekanga n’okukaaba kwayo okw’entiisa?

21.verse: Etakula ettaka mu kiwonvu, nga yeeyagala olw’amaanyi gaayo, n’eryoka efuluma okusisinkana abalwanyi abakutte ebyokulwanyisa.

22.verse: Esekerera okutya, n’eteba na kigitiisa. Ekitala tekigitiisa kugizza mabega.

23.verse: Omufuko ogujjudde obusaale gwesuukundira ku lubuto lwayo, awamu n’effumu erimasamasa, n’akasaale.

24.verse: Mu busungu obungi emira ettaka, tesobola kusigala mu kifo kimu ng’ekkondeere livuze.

25.verse: Ekkondeere bwe livuga n’egamba nti, ‘Awo!’ N’ewunyiriza olutalo olukyali ewala, n’ewulira n’okuleekaana kwa baduumizi b’amaggye.

26.verse: “Amagezi go ge gabuusa kamunye, n’ayanjuluza ebiwaawaatiro bye e bukiikaddyo?

27.verse: Ggwe olagira empungu okubuukira ewala mu bbanga, era n’ezimba n’ekisu kyayo waggulu ennyo?

28.verse: Ku lwazi kw’ezimba amaka gaayo ekiro n’esula okwo, ku lwazi olunywevu olutabetentebwa.

29.verse: Eyo gy’ekettera omuyiggo gw’eneerya, eriiso lyayo ligulengerera wala.

30.verse: Obwana bwayo bunywa omusaayi, era awali emirambo w’ebeera.”

1.verse: Awo MUKAMA n’agamba Yobu nti,

2.verse: “Oyo anoonya okuyombera ebitaliimu anaayombesa Ayinzabyonna? Oyo aleeta empaka ku Katonda, amuddemu.”

3.verse: Awo Yobu n’addamu MUKAMA nti,

4.verse: “Laba, sisaanidde, kiki kye nnaakuddamu? Emimwa kangibikkeko n’engalo.

5.verse: Njogedde omulundi gumu, so siddemu; weewaawo emirundi ebiri sseeyongere mulundi mulala.”

6.verse: Awo MUKAMA ng’ali mu muyaga ogw’amaanyi n’addamu Yobu nti,

7.verse: “Weesibe engoye zo onywere ng’omusajja. Ka nkubuuze, naawe onziremu.

8.verse: “Onojjulula ensala yange ey’emisango; ononsingisa omusango ggwe atuukiridde?

9.verse: Olina omukono ng’ogwa Katonda, eddoboozi lyo lisobola okubwatuka ng’erirye?

10.verse: Kale nno yambala ekitiibwa n’obukulu weesibe ekitiibwa n’okusukkuluma osukkulume.

11.verse: Yolesa obusungu bw’ekiruyi kyo otunuulire buli wa malala omusse wansi.

12.verse: Tunuulira buli musajja ow’amalala omukkakkanye era olinnyirire abakozi b’ebibi obabetentere we bali.

13.verse: Bonna baziikire wamu mu nfuufu, emitwe gyabwe ogibikkire mu ntaana.

14.verse: Nange kennyini ndyoke nzikirize, ng’omukono gwo ogwa ddyo, gusobola okukuwa amaanyi.”

15.verse: Amaanyi g’envubu - “Laba ekisolo ekyefaananyiriza ng’envubu kye natonda nga ggwe, erya omuddo ng’ente,

16.verse: nga kirina amaanyi mayitirivu mu kiwato kyakyo amaanyi mangi mu binywa by’olubuto lwakyo.

17.verse: Kiwuuba omukira gwakyo ne guba ng’omukira gw’omuvule Ebinywa by’ebisambi byakyo byakwatagana nnyo.

18.verse: Amagumba gaakyo gali ng’enseke ez’ebikomo; amagulu n’emikono ng’emitayimbwa.

19.verse: Kibalibwa mu bitonde bya Katonda ebisooka, ate nga Katonda eyakitonda asobola okukisemberera n’ekitala kye.

20.verse: Weewaawo ensozi zikireetera emmere, eyo ku nsozi, ensolo ez’omu nsiko zonna gye zizannyira.

21.verse: Wansi w’ebisiikirize by’emiti egy’amaggwa, we kyebaka, ne kyekweka mu bitoogo ne mu bitosi.

22.verse: Ebisiikirize by’emiti bikibikkako, emiti egiri ku mabbali g’omugga ne gikibikkako.

23.verse: Laba omugga ne bwe gusiikuuka tekyekanga; kiba kinywevu, Yoludaani ne bwajjula n’abooga.

24.verse: Eriyo omuntu yenna ayinza okukikwata, oba okuyuza ennyindo yaakyo n’akasaale?”

1.verse: Amaanyi ga Lukwata - “Oyinza okusikayo lukwata n’eddobo, oba okusiba olulimi lwayo n’omuguwa?

2.verse: Oyinza okuyingiza omuguwa mu nnyindo zaayo, oba okuwummula oluba lwayo n’eddobo?

3.verse: Eneekwegayirira ng’ekusaba nti, ogikwatirwe ekisa? Eneeyogera naawe mu bigambo ebigonvu?

4.verse: Eneekola naawe endagaano ogitwale ekuweereze obulamu bwayo bwonna?

5.verse: Onoozannya nayo nga bw’ozannya n’akanyonyi, oba okugisiba n’olukoba ng’agisibira bawala bo?

6.verse: Abasuubuzi banaagiramuza, oba banaagibala ng’ekyamaguzi?

7.verse: Oyinza okuvuba eddiba lyayo n’olijjuza amalobo, oba omutwe okugufumita n’amafumu agafumita ebyennyanja?

8.verse: Bw’oligissaako engalo zo ekirivaamu tolikyerabira, toliddayo kukikola!

9.verse: Essuubi lyonna ery’okugiwangula ffu, okugirabako obulabi kimalamu amaanyi.

10.verse: Teri n’omu mukambwe nnyo asobola kugyaŋŋanga. Kale, ani oyo asobola okuyimirira mu maaso gange?

11.verse: Ani alina kye yali ampoze musasule? Byonna ebiri wansi w’eggulu byange.

12.verse: “Ku bikwata ku mikono n’ebigere byayo siisirike, amaanyi gaayo n’ekikula kyayo bya ssimbo.

13.verse: Ani ayinza okugiggyako eddiba lyayo ery’oku ngulu? Ani ayinza okuyuza ekizibaawo kyayo eky’amaliba abiri?

14.verse: Ani ayinza okuggula enzigi z’akamwa kaayo? Amannyo gaayo geetooloddwa entiisa.

15.verse: Omugongo gwe gujjudde enkalala z’engabo ezisibiddwa okumukumu.

16.verse: Zonna zisibaganye nga tewali mpewo weeyita.

17.verse: Zakwatagana, ziri ku zinnaazo era tezisobola kwawulibwa.

18.verse: Bw’eyasimula, ebimyanso bijja, n’amaaso gaayo gali nga enjuba ng’egwa.

19.verse: Mu kamwa kaayo muvaamu ebiriro ebyaka. Kavaamu ensasi ez’omuliro.

20.verse: Mu nnyindo zaayo muvaamu omukka ng’ogwentamu eyeesera eri ku muliro ogw’emmuli ezaaka.

21.verse: Omukka oguva mu nnyindo zaayo gukoleeza Amanda.

22.verse: Mu nsingo yaayo mulimu amaanyi, n’entiisa eri mu maaso gaayo.

23.verse: Emiwula gy’ennyama yaayo gyegasse; gikutte nnyo era tegisobola kwenyeenya.

24.verse: Ekifuba kyayo kigumu ng’olwazi, kigumu ng’olubengo.

25.verse: Bwesituka ab’amaanyi batya. Badduka olw’okubwatuka kwayo.

26.verse: Ekitala bwe kigituukako tekirina kye kiyinza kumukolako, oba ffumu, oba omuwunda wadde akasaale akasongovu.

27.verse: Emenya ebyuma gy’obeera nti ekutulakutula bisasiro, ebyo ebikomo ebimenyaamenya ng’emiti emivundu.

28.verse: Akasaale tekayinza kugiddusa, amayinja ag’envumuulo gaba nga biti gy’eri.

29.verse: Embukuuli nayo eri ng’ebisusunku gy’eri. Esekerera amafumu agakasukibwa.

30.verse: Amagalagamba g’oku lubuto lwayo gali ng’engyo z’ensuwa. Bwe yeekulula mu bitosi ebeera ng’ekyuma ekiwuula.

31.verse: Ereetera obuziba bw’ennyanja okuba ng’entamu eyeesera. Ennyanja n’eba ng’entamu y’omuzigo ogufumbibwa.

32.verse: Mu mazzi mw’eyise, erekamu ekkubo ery’amayengo ameeru; ne kireeta n’ekirowoozo nti obuziba bulina envi.

33.verse: Tewali kigyenkana ku nsi; ekitonde ekitatya.

34.verse: Enyooma buli kisolo. Ye kabaka w’abo bonna ab’amalala.”

1.verse: Yobu Yeenenya nga Yeeyiyeeko Enfuufu ne Vvu - Awo Yobu n’addamu MUKAMA nti,

2.verse: “Mmanyi ng’oyinza okukola ebintu byonna, era tewali kyotegeka kyonna kiyinza kuziyizibwa.

3.verse: Wabuuza nti, ‘Ani ono aziyiza okuteesa kwange atalina magezi?’ Mazima ddala nayogera ebintu bye sitegeera, ebintu ebyassukirira okutegeera kwange.

4.verse: “Wulira nkwegayiridde, nange mbeeko kye nkubuuza, onziremu.

5.verse: Amatu gange gaali gaakuwulirako dda, naye kaakano amaaso gange gakulabye.

6.verse: Kyenvudde neenyooma era neenenyezza mu nfuufu ne mu vvu.”

7.verse: Nga MUKAMA amaze okwogera ebigambo bino eri Yobu, n’agamba Erifaazi Omutemani nti, “Nkunyiigidde ggwe ne mikwano gyo ababiri; kubanga temwanjogerako bituufu, ng’omuddu wange Yobu bw’akoze.

8.verse: Noolwekyo kaakano mutwale ente ennume musanvu, n’endiga ennume musanvu, mugende eri omuddu wange Yobu, mweweereyo eyo ekiweebwayo ekyokebwa, n’omuddu wange Yobu ajja kubasabira, kubanga nzija kukkiriza okusaba kwe nneme okubakolako ng’obusirusiru bwammwe bwe buli. Kubanga temwanjogerako bituufu ng’omuddu wange bw’akoze.”

9.verse: Awo Erifaazi Omutemani, ne Birudaadi Omusuki, ne Zofali Omunaamasi ne bagenda ne bakola nga MUKAMA bwe yabalagira. Awo MUKAMA n’akkiriza okusaba kwa Yobu.

10.verse: Awo MUKAMA n’aggyawo ennaku ya Yobu bwe yamala okusabira mikwano gye. MUKAMA n’awa Yobu ebintu emirundi ebiri okusinga bye yalina okusooka.

11.verse: Awo baganda be bonna ne bannyina bonna ne bajja n’abo abaali bamumanyi okusooka, ne balya naye emmere mu nnyumba ye; ne bamusaasira ne bamukulisa okubonaabona kwonna MUKAMA kwe yakkiriza okumutuukako. Buli omu ku bo n’amuwaayo ffeeza nga bwe yasobola, n’empeta ya zaabu.

12.verse: Awo MUKAMA n’awa Yobu omukisa mu nnaku ze ezaasembayo n’okusinga entandikwa ye bwe yali: yafuna endiga omutwalo gumu mu enkumi nnya, n’eŋŋamira kakaaga, ne ziseddume z’ente lukumi, n’endogoyi enkazi lukumi.

13.verse: Era MUKAMA n’amuwa n’abaana aboobulenzi musanvu, n’aboobuwala basatu.

14.verse: Omuwala ow’olubereberye n’amutuuma Yemima, n’owokubiri n’amutuuma Keeziya, n’owookusatu n’amutuuma Keremukappuki, n’aboobulezi musanvu.

15.verse: Awo mu nsi yonna ne wataba bakazi balungi kwenkana bawala ba Yobu. Kitaabwe n’abawa omugabo ogw’ebintu ogwenkanankana ne gwe yawa bannyinaabwe abalenzi.

16.verse: Oluvannyuma lw’ebyo, Yobu n’awangaala emyaka kikumi mu ana; n’alaba ku baana be ne ku bazzukulu be okutuuka ku bannakasatwe.

17.verse: N’oluvannyuma n’afa ng’akaddiyidde ddala ng’awezezza emyaka mingi.
